properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters extending out to 25 nm South of Marthas Vineyard and Nantucket
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 18 at 3:40AM EST until January 20 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Boston/Norton MA
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas
7 to 10 feet expected.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters extending out to 25 nm South of Marthas
Vineyard and Nantucket.

* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 AM EST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM EST MONDAY
